name: StepMania: On The Chill
tagline: StepMania 5 default-based theme with new logo artwork and blue color scheme
body:
![StepMania: On The Chill title screen](screenshots/2014-11-06/03-title-b.jpg)

![StepMania: On The Chill select style](screenshots/2014-11-06/06-select-style.jpg)

![StepMania: On The Chill select mode](screenshots/2014-11-06/07-select-mode-normal.jpg)

![StepMania: On The Chill select music](screenshots/2014-11-06/09-song-select.jpg)

## Introduction

**StepMania: On The Chill** is a theme for StepMania 5. It is based on the default theme by Midiman (of [SSC](http://ssc.ajworld.net)), and is actually intended to remain close enough to track most fixes/updates that apply to the original.

## The original theme

This is a fork of [a repo I started to track only the `Themes/default` directory within the main StepMania project](https://github.com/psmay/stepmania-default-theme).

## Changes

The notable changes include these:

* Palette of cooler and colder blues in place of the sunny yellows and oranges.
* New logotype and artwork for title and menu screens.
	* Original typeface from logotype, a work in progress, may eventually be incorporated as fonts in-game.
* Parallax cloud effects for some backgrounds.
* Vector-based re-renders (and, in places, reinterpretations) of some images.


## More details

[See the GitHub repo](https://github.com/psmay/stepmania-on-the-chill-theme) for more specific information.
